entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow near noon. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
